00016 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00017 {

00024     usage();

00027 
00028   if (toupper(argv[1][0])=='K') {
00029     cerr << "Using kernel stack.\n";
00030     if (minet_init(MINET_KERNEL)<0) {
00031       cerr << "Stack initialization failed.\n";
00032       goto err;
00033     } else {

00049

00051     cerr << "Unknown host.\n";
00052     goto err;

00054   bzero(&server_sa,sizeof(server_sa));
00055   server_sa.sin_family=AF_INET;
00056   memcpy((void*)(&(server_sa.sin_addr)),he->h_addr,he->h_length);
00057   server_sa.sin_port=htons(atoi(argv[3]));
00058 
00059   fd = minet_socket(SOCK_DGRAM);
00060 
00061   if (fd<0) {
00062     cerr << "Can't create socket.\n";
00063     minet_perror("reason:");
00064     goto err;
00065   } else {
00066     cerr << "Socket created.\n";
00067   }
00068 
00069   bzero(&client_sa,sizeof(client_sa));
00070   client_sa.sin_family=AF_INET;
00071   client_sa.sin_addr.s_addr=htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00072   client_sa.sin_port=htons(0);
00073 
00074   if (minet_bind(fd,&client_sa)<0) {
00075     cerr << "Can't bind socket.\n";
00076     minet_perror("reason:");
00077     goto err;
00078   } else {
00079     cerr << "Socket bound.\n";
00080   }
00081 
00082   if (minet_connect(fd,&server_sa)<0) {
00083     cerr << "Can't connect socket.\n";
00084     minet_perror("reason:");
00085     goto err;
00086   } else {
00087     cerr << "Socket connected.\n";
00088   }

00090   // temp:

00094 
00095   if (minet_write(fd, buf, 48) < 0) {

00097     minet_perror("reason:");
